class.name: CausedFocusEvent
class.javadoc: This class represents FocusEvents with a known "cause" - reason why this event happened. It can be mouse press, traversal, activation, and so on - all causes are described as Cause enum. The event with the cause can be constructed in two ways - explicitly through constructor of CausedFocusEvent class or implicitly, by calling appropriate requestFocusXXX method with "cause" parameter. The default cause is UNKNOWN.

Retargets the original focus event to the new target. If the original focus event is CausedFocusEvent, it remains such and cause is copied. Otherwise, new CausedFocusEvent is created, with cause as RETARGETED.
retargeted event, or null if e is null
